name: Amsterdam Walk
description:
Get your bearings in this beautiful city and cover all the major sights in a path across the charming bridges of Amsterdam’s canals. Be part of the evolution of this wonderful capital of the world that emerged out of the Amstel River back in the XII century.

You and your Private Guide will explore some little-known secrets of this Sin City: quaint, quiet corners; tranquil, tree-lined plazas and private courtyards. Your guide will also share priceless tips, helpful advice and cultural insights, bringing an insider´s expertise to your visit to Amsterdam.
